TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TrackBarRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來呈現具有視覺化樣式之追蹤列控制項的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a track bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現追蹤列控制項的每個部分，與目前作業系統的視覺化樣式的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render each part of a track bar control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 這非常有用，如果要繪製的自訂控制項，應該具有目前的視覺化樣式外觀。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的工作區，此類別中的方法將會繪製具有追蹤列目前的視覺化樣式。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods in this class will draw the track bar with the current visual style. 否則，此類別中的方法將會擲回。Otherwise, the methods in this class will throw an . 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，您可以檢查的值屬性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個項目所公開類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用的自訂控制項繪製回應按下滑鼠的水平的追蹤列的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the methods to draw a horizontal track bar that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DrawBottomPointingThumb (System.Drawing.Graphics g, System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState state);

.method public static hidebysig void DrawBottomPointingThumb(class System.Drawing.Graphics g, valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState state) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DrawBottomPointingThumb (g As Graphics, bounds As Rectangle, state As TrackBarThumbState)
public: static void DrawBottomPointingThumb(System::Drawing::Graphics ^ g, System::Drawing::Rectangle bounds, System::Windows::Forms::VisualStyles::TrackBarThumbState state);

param.name: g
param.span: 繪製追蹤列滑桿所用的 。

span.span: The used to draw the track bar slider.

param.name: bounds
param.span: 指定追蹤列滑桿繫結的 。

span.span: The that specifies the bounds of the track bar slider.

param.name: state
param.span: 其中一個 值，指定追蹤列滑桿的可見狀態。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the visual state of the track bar slider.

summary.span: 繪製具有視覺化樣式的下指 (Downward-Pointing) 追蹤列滑桿 (也稱為捲動方塊)。

span.span: Draws a downward-pointing track bar slider (also known as the thumb) with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認值屬性是`true`。Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the property is `true`.

exception.span: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 使用者已停用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認值屬性是`true`。Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the property is `true`. 如果寬度或高度，這個周框的刻度數目小於或等於零，或`g`是`null`，傳回而不會轉譯。If width or height of the bounding rectangle or the number of ticks is less than or equal to zero, or `g` is `null`, returns without rendering.

public: static System::Drawing::Size GetBottomPointingThumbSize(System::Drawing::Graphics ^ g, System::Windows::Forms::VisualStyles::TrackBarThumbState state);

param.name: g
param.span: 此作業將使用的 。

span.span: The this operation will use.

param.name: state
param.span: 其中一個 值，指定追蹤列滑桿的可見狀態。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the visual state of the track bar slider.

summary.span: 傳回指向下方之追蹤列滑桿 (也稱為捲動方塊) 的大小 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Returns the size, in pixels, of the track bar slider (also known as the thumb) that points down.

returns.span: ，指定滑桿的大小 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: A that specifies the size, in pixels, of the slider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑桿的大小取決於目前作業系統的視覺化樣式。The size of the slider is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認值屬性是`true`。Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the property is `true`.

exception.span: 作業系統不支援視覺化樣式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 使用者已停用作業系統中的視覺化樣式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 視覺化樣式不適用於應用程式視窗的工作區。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑桿的大小取決於目前作業系統的視覺化樣式。The size of the slider is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認值屬性是`true`。Before calling this method, you should verify that the value of the property is `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來判斷所使用的矩形大小繪製滑桿的方法。The following code example uses the method to determine the size of the rectangle used by the method to draw the slider. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
